AreaDetails.AreaDetail: 30 kms to the nearest airport (samui airport)

Reports.Report: The Samui Verticolor is a 15-minute drive from Lamai Beach and Samui Airport. The Big Buddha Temple is a 20-minute drive away. Just a 10-minute walk from Chaweng Beach and central Chaweng,

Deluxe room provide 27 square meters located on the 5 storey low-rise guestroom building. Its spacious bedroom comes with either, one double bed or Twin bed plus a sofa bed comfortably accommodating up to 2 adults plus 1 child. Its separate bathroom comes with standing shower and toilet..
Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner are available in this property
This hotel has a small lobby

Samui Verticolor is the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Samui. Situated only 1.0 km from the city center, guests are well located to enjoy the town's attractions and activities. With the city's main attractions such as The Samui Institute of Thai Culinary Arts, Thai Boxing Stadium, Pru Chaweng within close reach, visitors to the hotel will just love its location.

RoomCategory.RoomDescription: Deluxe room provide 27 square meters located on the 5 storey low-rise guestroom building. Its spacious bedroom comes with either, one double bed or Twin bed plus a sofa bed comfortably accommodating up to 2 adults plus 1 child. Its separate bathroom comes with standing shower and toilet..
